SELECT a.accom_no, a.host_no, a.admin_no, a.commission_no, accom_category.accom_category_name, a.accom_name, ad.sido, ad.sigungu, ad.road_name, ad.main_building_code, ad.sub_building_code, ad.building_name, acd.address_detail, ((sum(rev.review_rank)/COUNT(rev.review_rank))/2) AS accom_rate, a.accom_img, a.accom_description, a.create_date, a.update_date, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ad.sido," ", ad.sigungu," ", ad.road_name," ", ad.main_building_code," ", ad.sub_building_code,' ', ad.building_name," ", acd.address_detail) AS accom_addr FROM accom a LEFT JOIN accom_category ON a.accom_category_no = accom_category.accom_category_no LEFT JOIN room r ON r.accom_no = a.accom_no LEFT JOIN reserve re ON r.room_no = re.room_no LEFT JOIN payment pa ON pa.reserve_no = re.reserve_no LEFT JOIN review rev ON rev.payment_no = pa.payment_no LEFT JOIN accom_address acd ON a.accom_no = acd.accom_no LEFT JOIN address ad ON acd.address_no = ad.address_no WHERE accom_category_name IN
#{value}
AND a.accom_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{accomName},'%')
GROUP BY a.accom_name HAVING
accom_rate <= 1.9 OR accom_rate IS NULL
accom_rate >= 2.0 AND accom_rate <= 2.99
accom_rate >= 3.0 AND accom_rate <= 3.99
accom_rate >= 4.0 AND accom_rate <= 4.99
accom_rate >= 5.0
ORDER BY a.create_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

#{value}

accom_rate <= 1.9 OR accom_rate IS NULL
